myPosts.title: A little bit about Unsplash
myPosts.subtitle: I'm using Unsplash images to fill the blanks - this way I'll be focused on the rest of the blog.
myPosts.content:
Unsplash images made my life a lot easier whilst providing me project with crisp, fresh images constantly. I believe that it is worthwhile to delve into the API to reap the following benefits:

  •   - Categories: I'll be able to select exactly which kinds of images I want.

  - Responsiveness: Improved responsiveness from images.

Hopefully this way I can continue to use stock images whilst focusing on the blog.
myPosts.author: Jean-Maree
